did.unittitle: Richard Lamparski talks with the aged labor organizer, do-defendant in the Mooney-Billings case

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: About how it feels to append 23 years, 2 months and 23 days in jail for a crime he did not commit. Recorded late in 1969 in San Francisco
